name: Before the Lights Turn On (DX)
description:
Before the Lights Turn On is a bite-sized platforming adventure game where you play as a kid exploring the neighborhood where your grandmother lives. Grandma says you need to be home before the lights turn on, but dusk always seems to come when you're as far away as you can be!

Collect flowers, talk to residents, and explore the monochrome landscape in this quick 10 minute adventure.

Team Bismuth! 

  • Schala
  • Rick
  • Roland
  • Tyler
  • Micah
